description:
A schema in a delta sharing service.

 A schema is a logical grouping of tables.
 It may contain multiple tables.

^(shareId)$.description: The unique identifier for the share this schema belongs to.

properties.description: A map of key-value properties attached to the securable.

share.description: The share name that the schema belongs to.

share_id.description: The unique identifier for the share this schema belongs to.

title: Sharing Schema Info
